Text:
Thanks 80z for Age of Mirrors and Idle Eyes, the other albums are great and extremely rare as always. I hope you've found also Idle Eyes - Standing at the Edge (1988) and Body Electric - Walking Through Walls (1987) and that you'll post them once in your future uploads.
Your contribution is never appreciated enough.
Cheers.

Just stumbled across your 80's posts.
Any chance you could locate one of my favorite 80's albums by Michael De Barres ?

kissfan, as far as I recall, I posted one of his records here:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5693278/4_Rare_80s_Albums_[Part_99]_Rock__Art_Rock__Ska__Blues_Rock

r.trifun, I will upload the other two when I get a chance to rip them. cheers
Thank you. Another job very well done. As always, you introduce me to something new. Be well. Cheers. T.
